author: Special Correspondent
text: The Southern Railway will run Super Fast Suvidha special trains from Tiruchi to Santragachi via Chennai Egmore to clear the summer rush as per the following schedule: Train No. 00609 Tiruchi – Santragachi superfast Suvidha special train will leave Tiruchi at 5.30 p.m. on April 2, 9, 16 and 23 (Saturdays) and reach Santragachi at 4.30 a.m. on Mondays. The trains will have one AC 2-tier, three AC 3-tier, 13 sleeper class, two general second class and two luggage-cum-brake van coaches. The trains will stop at Srirangam, Ariyalur, Vridhachalam, Villupuram, Chengalpattu, Tambaram, Chennai Egmore, Gudur, Nellore, Ongole, Chirala, Tenali, Vijayawada, Eluru, Tadepalligudem, Rajahmundry, Samalkot, Duvvada, Vizianagaram, Srikakulam Road, Palasa, Brahmapur, Khurda Road, Bhubaneswar, Cuttack, Bhadrak, Balasore and Kharagpur. Advance Reservation for the trains are open, a Southern Railway press release said.
title: Special trains to Santragachi
